title: can we buff assassins already?
body:
Im so sick and tired of having to have Zed, Yasuo, and etc on my teammates in ranked always feeding or throwing hard as always late game.  While their winrate is below average, and ppl still believe they are op LOL.

"Hey vlad idk what u talking about zed, hes doin good"  *zed throws so hard late game*

but out of all assassins, mother f**kin... yasuo picks on my team...  even tho they have played with him a lot, they still tend to go on average 0/7 K/D in ranked. 

Alright im dodging any ppl thats picking yasuo or any other weak assassins from now on
